text: I've always loved this track from Uncharted 2. The deliberate use of the erhu at the start, followed by the guzheng at 2:00, two popular Chinese instruments, gives it an oriental flavour that matches the Eastern theme of the game.

text: Uncharted 1 and 2 were two of the most amazing games I've ever played. The gameplay was simple but fun, the story was INSANELY good, almost if not movie quality, and the graphics were and still are amazing. Uncharted 3 wasn't as good as the first two, but it was still miles ahead of most other games and an amazing game in general. Naughty dog has a talent, and I honestly  can't wait for that Drakes Fortune movie to get out of development hell :D

author: Juicebox

text: @treyvs360 Now I think you need to accept the fact that they're both good franchises, whether you prefer one over the other, and stop talking because your opinions really are getting stupider and stupider
author: Juicebox

text: @treyvs360 There have been a huge wave of games delivering a horde like mode with their games. And why is that? Because it's a revolutionary idea that people enjoy playing . What do you thinks going to happen with Beast based on Horde, seeing as you like to judge games based on their previous iterations.
author: Juicebox

text: @treyvs360 lol sorry but ur not that smart. u told me that new weapons and cover abilities are nothing to care about, yet you're ranting about the new melee system in uncharted. To me they're equal. And dedicated servers are a big deal , especially for gears fans because of the terrible matchmaking in gears 2. And little big planet and gears are a completely different type of game, I find it stupid to compare them. And finally you haven't been noticing the trend in next gen titles post gears 2..
author: Juicebox

text: @treyvs360 You obviously haven't been paying much attention to gears then. Or maybe it just doesnt matter that it has 4 player co op a revamped horde mode,dedicated servers, more weapons and cover abilities (on the already best cover system), the ability to use mods in campaign, score mode, a public beta. But tbh this isnt something worth arguing about they're both great games and I think they're each the top on the cotnsole. Why decide between them? buI can say that they're both better than cod
